description: Seishirou`s younger brother, who is also a treasure hunter and apparent leader of the people of Tokyo Tower. He arrived in Tokyo four years earlier along with a feather of Sakura`s. Little is known about him right now, but he does seem to have an interest In Kamui and he seems to be friends with Yuuko, for whom he retrieves items for whenever he traverses to different dimensions.
name: Fuuma
